summaries:
This document is a Form 10-K annual report filed by Oracle Corporation with the United States Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC). The report covers the fiscal year ending May 31, 2025. Oracle Corporation is incorporated in Delaware and has its principal executive offices in Austin, Texas.

The report includes details about the securities registered by Oracle Corporation, such as Common Stock and 3.125% senior notes due July 2025. It also mentions that Oracle Corporation is a large accelerated filer and has filed all required reports for the past year and the last 90 days.

The report also includes an attestation to the effectiveness of Oracle's internal control over financial reporting under Section 404(b) of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act. The aggregate market value of Oracle's voting stock held by non-affiliates was $305,793,119,000 as of May 31, 2025.

Portions of Oracle's definitive proxy statement relating to its 2025 annual meeting of stockholders are also incorporated into this report and will be filed with the SEC within 120 days of the end of the fiscal year.
